Smart Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that tracks your wardrobe and suggests outfits based on your personal style and the weather. It can also keep track of when clothes need to be washed and provide reminders.
Multi-Purpose Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that doubles as a storage unit for shoes, bags, and accessories. It can also have hooks for hanging jewelry and scarves.
Foldable Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that folds flat when not in use, making it easy to store in small spaces. It can also have built-in storage for belts and shoes.
Smart Clothes Hanger with WiFi: A clothes hanger that connects to the internet and can be controlled via a smartphone app. It can suggest outfits, provide weather updates, and even play music.

Clothes Hanger with Built-In Lighting: A clothes hanger that has built-in lighting, making it easy to see clothes in a dark closet. It can also have adjustable settings for different moods and activities.
